datas.name: What are binary options?
datas.description: Is an option with a fixed profit, where payout is determined at the onset of the contract. It pays a fixed amount of cash if the option expires in-the-money, independent of themagnitude by which the price of the underlying asset moves.

datas.name: What is a "Call" option?
datas.description: An option that provides the holder with a profit when the underlying asset increases in price compared with the level it was purchased at.

datas.name: What is a put options?
datas.description: An option that provides the holder with a profit when the underlying asset depreciates relative to the purchase level.

datas.name: What return will I get for a successful investment?
datas.description: A successful investment will result in a guaranteed return indicated on the site for the underlying asset that you selected.

datas.name: How long does the deal last?
datas.description: The deal lasts untill expiration time, that has being chosen before

datas.name: Could i finish the deal before expiration time?
datas.description: After confirming the deal, expiration time couldn`t be changed.

footer.support: For all questions please contact customer support:
descriptions: You haven`t made any investments in Option builder tool yet. To make an investment you should: Choose the asset you want to trade with, enter your current investment amount. And choose how will asset behavior: if it will rise - press HIGH button, other way press LOW button. Select the profit and the pay off level. Confirm your deal with the Confirmal button. Due to different time zones at the worldwide stocks, some assets could be inactive or might has limited availability. If the asset`s value didn`t change sinse made an investment, the full investment price will be returned to investor.
Legal: auto-bitrading.com is a trading name of BitTrading, registration number: IBC 2015 (Suite 305, Griffith Corporate Centre, Beachmont, Kingstown, St. Vincent and the Grenadines)

0.name: How long does the deal last?

0.name: Could i finish the deal before expiration time?
0.description: After confirming the deal, expiration time couldn`t be changed.

0.name: What return will I get in the event that the option expires out-of-the-money?
0.description: In the event that the option expires out-of-the-money, you`ll recieve a refund, depending of selected profit/refund level (Available in options builder only). For example: investment with a 60/20% profit means, that you will recieve your investment and the 60% of investment if you`ll win, otherway you will get a 20% refund of investment. However refund in lost options are not available in "60 seconds" and "Classic binary options" because of high profit level.

0.name: What is expiration time
0.description: The expiration time is the time and date on which an option expires.

0.name: Do I have to download software in order to trade with BitTrading?
0.description: There is absolutely no need for you to download anything before you can start trading with BitTrading. All you need to do is register and deposit funds into your account and you`ll be ready to start trading binary options for yourself.

0.name: How does the company recieve quotes?
0.description: Stock provides binary options with current price of different assets regularly.

0.name: What does an Underlying Asset means?
0.description: It means the option you create using a commodity, index, stock, currency pair or any other financial asset.

0.name: How to invest?
0.description: Investment is easy: choose your asset to trade and choose "call" or a "put" option by clicking on it. Clicking on the call/put button will open a quick investment window where you need to type in the amount you wish to invest and approve execution. Keep in mind that rates keep updating in the investment sheet.

0.name: How could i cancel the deal if i did not push a "Submit" button?
0.description: The deal will not apply until you push a "Submit" button. So You can choose another asset or just select another trading tool.

0.name: What is the expiry level?
0.description: The expiry level is the level of the underlying asset at the time of expiry of the asset according to Stock.

0.name: What happens if the expiry level of a given underlying asset is identical to the level at which the transaction was made?
0.description: In case of expiry at an identical level to the transaction level, the amount of the investment is returned to the customer.

0.name: Why can`t I make an investment?
0.description: Investments in all assets can be made during market trading hours, Outside market trading hours, the asset will not be displayed. Further reason might be a lack of funds in your account for the requested investment. In any other case please contact our support team at support@BitTrading.com

0.name: Why do assets are not displayed sometimes?
0.description: Only active assets open for trading are available for making an investment.

0.name: Do i have to make a deposit to register?
0.description: Registration does not require deposit and absolutely free

0.name: What is the difference between stock and binary options?
0.description: Classic "vanilla" stock options has a much bigger expire time and uknown profit. Binary options may last even one minute and has a fixed profit level.

0.name: How many time needed to transfer funds to my account?
0.description: As rule less than one minute.

0.name: How many time needed for withdrawal operation?
0.description: As rule from one to three days.

0.name: How can I access my transaction history?
0.description: Just click on your "Account" section and view all of your deposits, withdrawals and history.

0.name: How can I deposit money?
0.description: Please refer to "Deposit" page in Your account profile. We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard etc.), Maestro debit cards, wire transfers and Moneybookers e-wallet

0.name: When could i make a deal?
0.description: In a 60-second options you can make a deal in a minute before the option will expire. Other binary options investments could be made not less than 5 minutes before expire time.

0.name: How fast can I start trading?
0.description: You should register and make a deposit. Than you will be able to make an investments.

about_us.title: About us
descriptions: Market BitTrading was developed in 2012 for both beginners and skilled traders who choose to trade safely on the binary options market, acquire decision-making skills and keep up to date on international economic and financial developments.

Market BitTrading relies on a team of professionals of the financial market, whose mission is to advise and assist customers in their investments and make efforts so that they would benefit from multiple profit opportunities.

Having analyzed the investorâs profile, we set up an efficient and profitable "Money Management", which is fully customized to the investors needs. Market BitTrading offers access to binary options trading for everyone via the fusion of a simple interface, ongoing support and an available and proactive professional team.
We strive to provide the highest level of customer service in order to achieve our goal of 100% customer satisfaction.lopments.

bonus.title:
Bonus program
Trading Bonus
descriptions: In this Bonus program, for each amount of deposit, you get a certain % as bonus to your trading account. This will allow you to trade with a larger amount than your initial investment.You may recieve bonus on your account by making a deposit and entering a special bonus code in deposit menu field "promo code". Bonus amount may vary depending on offers. You may receive bonus codes on partner sites or our advertisements.
You can easily withdraw the bonus amount from your account, only after having made a turnover of 30 times the bonus amount you received and deposite funds.
Turnover is the total amount of open positions, regardless of the results of closing deals.

During the period of reaching turnover, your deposit amount and bonus amount will be temporarily closed. You are free to withdraw any profits you made after closing the bonus and the fmount of withdrawal funds can not be more than three deposite and bonus amounts.
We strongly recommend our customers to check the terms and conditions of use of our website, as well as services before you start trading.

Our company is neither explicitly nor implicitly not acting representative or a guarantee that your use of the Site and / or services the site is legitimate. You should carefully consider the suitability of trading binary options given your experience and knowledge of the financial markets, your objectives, financial resources and other relevant circumstances.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal of funds
withdrawal.description: To withdraw funds from the account, the client must make an application for withdrawal of funds in his personal account. To withdraw, you need to specify the account number, withdrawal amount and click on the Request for withdrawal of funds button. The system automatically converts to dollars at the rate of your bank or electronic billing service.

payment_select.title: Ð¡hoose the type of payment
description: Applications for the withdrawal of customer funds fall into the financial department of the company and are processed in the order of the general queue. The period for processing an application for withdrawal of funds ranges from several hours to one business day.

To withdraw funds from a personal account, you do not need to pay anything extra. There are no additional payments, no taxes and other fees. Only a commission is charged by the bank, according to your tariff plan.

deposit.title: Deposit Funds
deposit.description: In order to deposit funds to a personal account, the client must have a Visa, MasterCard, Mir or Electronic Wallet bank card. To replenish, you need to specify the deposit amount in dollars and click the Make a deposit button.

form.title: Specify the size of the deposit:
description: Enter the amount from USD 150 to USD 2000
If you have a Promo Code please enter it in this field

trade.description: In order to deposit funds to a personal account, the client must have a Visa, MasterCard, Mir or Electronic Wallet bank card. To replenish, you need to specify the deposit amount in dollars and click the Make a deposit button.

robot.title: Launching automatic trading
description: To start automatic trading, you need to start the algorithm by clicking on the Start button.
The trading algorithm will stop automatically after each calendar day GMT (Greenwich Mean Time).
